definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_block</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Checks if block right clicked by the player is log (you can change it to whatever you want)</comment><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:SpruceTargetStage1</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Replace the log block to its stripped version.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:SpruceTargetStage0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
